Articles.Content:
Recently I've been doing a lot of live-streams on twitch. Since most are non-KSP related, I thought I'd just post a thread here telling the fellow members of the community when I am live-streaming (and what games I am live-streaming).

I tend to live-stream various games (usually whatever I feel like playing that day). I've streamed X-Com EW Long War, KSP, From The Depths and Rocket League, though I do want to add Xenonauts and Spore to that list in the near future.

[![Noname117Spore.png](http://streambadge.com/twitch/dark/Noname117Spore.png)](http://twitch.tv/Noname117Spore)

\*Mods, if this is the wrong section please move this. I'm putting this in the space lounge because that is where Starwhip put his starmade stream (which I watched for a brief amount of time).

Thanks for stopping by, and I'll be posting regular announcements when streams start.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-21T00:41:10Z" title="08/21/2015 12:41  AM" data-short="8 yr">August 21, 2015</time> by Noname117**
Going to be streaming some live KSP right now for anyone interested.
